nodes.text: The 4XB programming was a type of programming droid. One 4XB programming droid, DA1-4XB, worked for the Pyke Syndicate at the spice mines of Kessel. DA1-4XB was freed during a uprising initiated by the droid L3-37.

The 4XB programming first appeared in Solo: A Star Wars Story. But it was given a name in the StarWarsKids.com video, Every Droid in Star Wars. In Star Wars Legends the 4XB programming was called the 4XB Programmer Droid. The droid appeared in Escape from Balis-Baurgh in Star Wars Adventure Journal 1.
